openl-mcp-server-basic-auth.comment: OpenL Tablets MCP Server with Basic Authentication. Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path (e.g., 'node' or '/usr/bin/node') and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory.

openl-mcp-server-oauth2.comment: OpenL Tablets MCP Server with OAuth 2.1 Authentication (using token-url). Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path (e.g., 'node' or '/usr/bin/node') and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory.

openl-mcp-server-oauth2-issuer.comment: OpenL Tablets MCP Server with OAuth 2.1 Authentication (using issuer-uri). Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path (e.g., 'node' or '/usr/bin/node') and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory.

openl-mcp-server-oauth2-pkce.comment: OpenL Tablets MCP Server with OAuth 2.1 PKCE (Ping Identity) - Automatic Browser Flow. Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path (e.g., 'node' or '/usr/bin/node' or '/path/to/node') and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory.

openl-mcp-server-pat.comment: OpenL Tablets MCP Server with Personal Access Token (PAT) Authentication. Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path (e.g., 'node' or '/usr/bin/node') and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory. Replace <your-pat-token> with your Personal Access Token created in OpenL Tablets UI.
